doc.plot: One is attracted by the enchanting castle far far away, and finally reached and being in side that long-cherished place. In reality, the castle is not as great as it looks but nothing more than a depressing transformed machinery workshop.

One is attracted by the enchanting castle far far away, and finally reached and being in side that long-cherished place. In reality, the castle is not as great as it looks but nothing more than a depressing transformed machinery workshop.
